meanings.definition: The act of performing a backward somersault.
meanings.sent1: During the talent show, Sarah amazed everyone with her flawless backflipping.
meanings.sent2: Gymnasts often include backflipping in their routines to showcase their agility.
meanings.sent3: The clown attempted backflipping on the trampoline but ended up landing on his face.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were backflipping through her mind, each one more exciting than the last.
meanings.sent5: The backflipping of the acrobat left the audience in awe of his skill and grace.

meanings.sent1: The gymnast practiced backflipping every day to perfect her technique.
meanings.sent2: He surprised everyone by effortlessly backflipping off the diving board.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be backflipping around the room, chasing an imaginary mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was backflipping with joy as she received the good news.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's backflipping across the stage added an exciting element to the performance.
